src:
Šta nas očekuje u ABA ligi ovog vikenda...
Kolo otvara slovenački okršaj Krke i Primorske. Najzanimljiviji duel ovog vikenda na Jadranu igra se u Pioniru, dok Zvezda gostuje Ciboni i ne bi smela da ima većih problema

01 Nov 2019

Crvena zvezda i Partizan dosad imaju skor 2-2 i ukupno gledano imaju najlošiji start kada se gledaju njihovi učinci „u paketu“ još od sezone 2012/2013. Dakle, u proteklih sedam godina. Naravno, uprkos ovome, večiti beogradski rivali su i dalje prvi favoriti za osvajanje Jadrana ako gledamo kvalitet na papiru i realnu snagu ekipa, ali će u nastavku morati da pružaju bolje igre. I priliku za to će imati već u petom kolu kada Partizan dočekuje FMP, a Crvena zvezda će gostovati Ciboni u Zagrebu.
FMP je do sada uz Cedevita Olimpiju jedini neporaženi tim u ligi, tako da će to biti prilično izazovan duel za crno-bele koji traže povratak na pobedničku stazu posle poraza od Cedevite u Ljubljani.
Ono što Partizanu ide naruku je što je poslednja četiri duela ovih timova dobio domaćin, što znači da domaća ekipa ima prednost po pravilu. Partizan je dobio četiri od poslednjih šest susreta protiv Pantera, a poslednji sa čak 97:59.
Ekipa koja u svom sastavu ima Uskokovića, Radanova, Pota, Jeremića, Momirova, Đorđevića, Tejića, Pecarskog i ostale ne mora da brine o talentu, a samo je pitanje da li će se kockice složiti, pa da i rezultati budu oni pravi. I – složile su se za Pantere na startu ove sezone koji dobro rade pod trenerskom palicom Vlade Jovanovića.
S druge strane, Partizan ima odličan skor u Evrokupu, pogodio je sa brojnim pojačanjima, ali i očekuje bolje igre od Parahovskog, Pejnersa, Birčevića... Sve u svemu, očekuje se vrlo zanimljiv sudar.
Crvena zvezda se vraća u Zagreb gde je ove sezone imala neprijatnost u vidu poraza od Primorske. Sada će protivnik Zvezdi biti Cibona i to će biti stari klasik jadranske lige koji može da posluži beogradskom sastavu da uhvati zalet pred nastavak sezone.
Zvezda u poslednje vreme igra jako dobro protiv Cibone protiv koje ima pobede na 10 poslednjih susreta. Tako gledajući, ne bi trebalo ni ovoga puta da ima nekih problema. Ovaj meč dolazi u nezgodnom momentu Zvezdi posle duplog kola Evrolige, tako da će igrači u crveno-belom biti vrlo umorni, ali nema sumnje da Zvezda po kvalitetu ima bolji tim i da je favorit na ovom susretu. Ukoliko glavni igrači Zvezde poput Berona, Gista i Perperoglua pruže igru kakvu znaju, Cibona će imati vrlo težak posao.
Još jedan izuzetno bitan i zanimljiv igraće se u Baru gde Mornar dočekuje Cedevita Olimpiju i probaće tim iz Bara da skine oreol nepobedivosti Zmajevima. Ovo su ekipe koje pucaju na sam vrh tabele ABA lige tako da za očekivati dobru košarku i veliki broj poena. Tako da ako volite da se kladite na broj poena, ovde odaberite plus, jer posebno ako domaćima krenu trojke ovo može da bude duel na kom će i jedan i drugi tim dati po 90 ili blizu 100 poena.
Prvi duel odigraće Krka i Primorska, što će biti njihov prvi okršaj u najkvalitetnijem regionalnom takmičenju. Prethodno su vodili bitke u ABA 2 ligi, odnosno finalu tog takmičenja pre dve sezone, kada je sastav iz Novog Mesta bio bolji. Tim iz Kopra morao je da čeka još godinu da bi se domogao najboljeg društva, a pobedničke navike nije menjao. Već je postao kost u grlu mnogih velikana, o čemu svedoče pobede nad Crvenom zvezdom, Partizanom i Budućnosti.
Na kraju, Mega u neobičnom terminu od 12 časova popodne dočekuje Budućnost u matineu ABA lige. Videćemo kako će se igraći snaći u ovom terminu, a Budućnost ima ulogu favorita.

ABA - 5. KOLO


Petak20.00: (3,05) Krka (15,0) Primorska (1,45)


Subota18.00: (2,15) Mornar (14,5) Cedevita Olimpija (1,80)20.00: (1,20) Partizan (19,0) FMP (5,00)


Nedelja12.00: (4,40) Mega (17,0) Budućnost (1,25)18.00: (5,50) Cibona (20,0) Crvena zvezda (1,17)20.00: (1,30) Igokea (16,0) Zadar (3,90)


*** kvote su podložne promenama




Foto: ABA / Koper Primorska / Ziga Mikeli
text:
What awaits us in the ABA league this weekend ...
The round opens the Slovenian clash of Krka and Primorska. The most interesting duel this weekend in the Adriatic is played in Pionir, while Zvezda is visiting Cibona and should have no major problems

01 Nov 2019

Red Star and Partizan have a score of 2-2 so far and overall have the worst start when looking at their "bundled" performance since the 2012/2013 season. So for the past seven years. Of course, despite this, eternal Belgrade rivals are still the first favorites to conquer the Adriatic if we look at the quality on paper and the real strength of the teams, but they will have to provide better games below. They will have the opportunity to do so already in the fifth round when Partizan welcomes FMP, and Red Star will host Cibona in Zagreb.
FMP is the only undefeated team in the league so far with Cedevita Olympia, so it will be quite a challenging duel for the black and whites seeking a return to the winning track after losing to Cedevita in Ljubljana.
What goes wrong with Partizan is that the last four duels of these teams were hosted, which means that the home team has the advantage as a rule. Partizan have won four of their last six meetings against the Panthers, the last with as many as 97:59.
A team that has Uskokovic, Radanov, Pot, Jeremic, Momir, Djordjevic, Tejic, Pecarski and others in their squad doesn't have to worry about talent, and it's just a question of whether the dice will agree, so that the results are the right ones. And - they agreed for the Panthers at the start of the season doing well under the coaching staff of Vlado Jovanovic.
Partizan, on the other hand, have a great performance in Eurocup, he has scored with numerous reinforcements, but he also expects better games than Parahovsky, Peyners, Bircevic ... All in all, a very interesting collision is expected.
The Red Star is returning to Zagreb, where this season has had the embarrassment of defeating Primorska. Now the opponent will be Cibona and it will be an old Adriatic league classic that can serve the Belgrade squad to catch a run-up before the season continues.
The star has been playing really well against Cibona lately, with wins in its last 10 matches. Thus, there should be no problems this time around either. This match comes at an awkward moment for the Stars after the Euroleague double round, so the players in red and white will be very tired, but there is no doubt that the quality of the Star has a better team and is the favorite in this match. If major players like Beron, Gist and Perperoglu provide the game as they know it, Cibona will have a very difficult job.
Another extremely important and interesting game will be played in the Bar where the Sailor greets Cedevita Olympia and will try a team from Bar to take down the halo of invincibility with the Dragons. These are the teams that shoot at the top of the ABA league table, so you can expect good basketball and plenty of points. So if you like to bet on the number of points, choose a plus here, because especially if the hosts go threes, this can be a duel that will give both teams 90 or close to 100 points.
The first duel will be played by Krka and Primorska, which will be their first fight in the highest quality regional competition. Previously, they fought in the ABA 2 league, that is, the finale of that competition two seasons ago, when the Novo Mesto squad was better. The team from Koper had to wait another year to reach the best of society, and it did not change their winning habits. It has already become a bone in the throat of many greats, as evidenced by victories over Red Star, Partizan and Future.
Finally, at an unusual time of 12 pm, Mega welcomes Future to the ABA League matinee. We will see how the players will perform in this term and the Future plays the role of favorites.

ABA - DAY 5


Friday20.00: (3.05) Krka (15.0) Primorska (1.45)


Saturday18.00: (2.15) Sailor (14.5) Cedevita Olympia (1.80) 20.00: (1.20) Partizan (19.0) FMP (5.00)


Sunday12.00: (4.40) Mega (17.0) Future (1.25) 18.00: (5.50) Cibona (20.0) Red Star (1.17) 20.00: (1.30) Igokea ( 16.0) Zadar (3.90)
